71  enum FFTPlanningMode {
72  ESTIMATE, //*< Simple heuristic, fast
73  MEASURE, //*< More time consuming. Usually close to optimal.
74  PATIENT, //*< More consuming than MEASURE
75  EXHAUSTIVE //*< Very demanding
76  };
77 
78  inline int FFTsize(int n) {
79  return n / 2 + 1;
80  }
81 
88  class BaseFFT : public AlgoBase {
89  public:
90 
98  BaseFFT(int size, enum FFTPlanningMode mode, bool PreserveInput) {
99  mPlan = NULL;
100  mPlanNeedsUpdate = false;
101  mLogicalSize = size;
102  SetPlanningMode(mode);
103  SetPreserveInput(PreserveInput);
104  };
105 
111  BaseFFT(const BaseFFT& from) {
112  mPlan = NULL;
113  mPlanNeedsUpdate = false;
114  mLogicalSize = from.mLogicalSize;
115  mPlanningRigor = from.mPlanningRigor;
116  mPlanningRestriction = from.mPlanningRestriction;
117  };
118 
122  virtual ~BaseFFT() {
123  if (mPlan) {
124  fftw_destroy_plan(mPlan);
125  }
126  };

132 
138  static void SaveWisdomOnFile(std::string filename) {
139  FILE *out = fopen(filename.c_str(), "w");
140  if (out == 0) {
141  throw std::runtime_error("Can't open wisdom file for saving");
142  }
143  fftw_export_wisdom_to_file(out);
144  fclose(out);
145  }
146 
152  static void LoadWisdomFromFile(std::string filename) {
153  FILE *in = fopen(filename.c_str(), "r");
154  if (in == 0) {
155  throw;
156  }
157  if (fftw_import_wisdom_from_file(in) == 0) {
158  throw std::runtime_error("Can't open wisdom file for reading");
159  }
160  fclose(in);
161  }
162 
166  static void ForgetWisdom() {
167  fftw_forget_wisdom();
168  }
169 
173  virtual void MakePlan() = 0;

177 
182 
183 
185 
190 
196  void SetPlanningMode(enum FFTPlanningMode mode) {
197  unsigned int mPlanningRigorNew = FFTW_ESTIMATE;
198  switch (mode) {
199  case ESTIMATE:
200  mPlanningRigorNew = FFTW_ESTIMATE;
201  break;
202  case MEASURE:
203  mPlanningRigorNew = FFTW_MEASURE;
204  break;
205  case PATIENT:
206  mPlanningRigorNew = FFTW_PATIENT;
207  break;
208  case EXHAUSTIVE:
209  mPlanningRigorNew = FFTW_EXHAUSTIVE;
210  break;
211  }
212  if (mPlanningRigorNew != mPlanningRigor) {
213  mPlanningRigor = mPlanningRigorNew;
214  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
215  }
216  };
217 
224  void SetPreserveInput(bool flag = true) {
225  unsigned int mPlanningRestrictionNew;
226  if (flag) {
227  mPlanningRestrictionNew = FFTW_PRESERVE_INPUT;
228  } else {
229  mPlanningRestrictionNew = FFTW_DESTROY_INPUT;
230  }
231  if (mPlanningRestrictionNew != mPlanningRestriction) {
232  mPlanningRestriction = mPlanningRestrictionNew;
233  mPlanNeedsUpdate = true;
234  }
235  }
236 
237 
238 
240 
241  protected:
242
